title: Polymoth

|   | A brilliant little moth. A hateful mutagenic dust rolls off its wings.***“All those moments will be lost in time, like tears in the rain.” -Roy Batty, “Blade Runner” |

## Useful Info

**Polymoths** are dangerous [insects](/List_of_insects "List of insects") which magnify the threat posed by any monsters they come into contact with. They will occasionally [polymorph](/Polymorph "Polymorph") any nearby monsters into different, stronger monsters, though the chance of them doing so falls rapidly as the monster's [HD](/HD "HD") rises.

## History

Polymoths were considered for addition in [0.13](/0.13 "0.13"), and could be encountered in [trunk](/Trunk "Trunk") for a brief time, but were never included in a stable version.

Polymoth

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Obsolete: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.

For a list of all arthropods, see list of arthropods.

polymoth y 
HP 39-73
HD 10
XP 828
Speed 12
AC 0
EV 10
Will 53
Attack1 20 (bite: plain)


Resistances None
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Land
Intelligence Insect
Uses Uses nothing
Holiness Natural
Size Small
Type moth, polymoth
Flags Flying
No stairs
No skeleton
No poly
A brilliant little moth. A hateful mutagenic dust rolls off its wings.

“All those moments will be lost in time, like tears in the rain.”
-Roy Batty, “Blade Runner”

Useful Info

Polymoths are dangerous insects which magnify the threat posed by any monsters they come into contact with. They will occasionally polymorph any nearby monsters into different, stronger monsters, though the chance of them doing so falls rapidly as the monster's HD rises.

History

Polymoths were considered for addition in 0.13, and could be encountered in trunk for a brief time, but were never included in a stable version.

Retrieved from "http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Polymoth&oldid=25146"

-Roy Batty, “Blade Runner”}} ==Useful Info== '''Polymoths''' are dangerous [[list of insects|insects]] which magnify the threat posed by any monsters they come into contact with. They will occasionally [[polymorph]] any nearby monsters into different, stronger monsters, though the chance of them doing so falls rapidly as the monster's [[HD]] rises. ==History== Polymoths were considered for addition in [[0.13]], and could be encountered in [[trunk]] for a brief time, but were never included in a stable version.
